name: clean-blog
title: Clean Blog
author: Start Bootstrap
description: [Clean Blog](http://startbootstrap.com/template-overviews/clean-blog/) is a stylish, responsive blog theme for [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/) created by [Start Bootstrap](http://startbootstrap.com/). This theme features a blog homepage, about page, contact page, and an example post page along with a working PHP contact form.
